basic_info.description: My name is Kris and I am a full-stack web developer focusing on the MERN stack. I am an Air Force Veteran who specialized in inter and intra service communications. I went to college for electronics and sustainable energy generation and control. Think industrial level solar and hydro-power and commercial electrical controls. I fell in love with software development while on parental leave when my daughter was born. I knew it was where I wanted to be in 5, 10 , 20 years and I am currently looking to fill a role for a  company with a structured mentorship program. I have worked with the MERN stack and use VSCode and github as my primary programming tools. I have experience working remotely on solo and group projects. I really love making accessible, interactive user interfaces.

projects.title: Pat's Salmon Cookies
projects.description: A project to practice my CSS skills and DOM manipulation for inserting a table of data on the sales page.

projects.title: Take Ten Web App
projects.description: Codefellows 201 course final group project. A random workout generator based on user input. Created using only vanill JS, CSS and HTML.

projects.title: 2D Bouncy Ball
projects.description: One of the first javaScript projects I completed. Followed a tutorial from the Mozilla Developers Network.
